      • step

        public java.awt.geom.Point2D.Float step(java.awt.geom.Point2D.Float p,
                               float velocity,
                               float dt)
        Moves the point p along the path at velocity speed. For generalized usage.
        Parameters:
        p - Point currently on the path
        velocity - Speed to traverse the path at
        dt - Time step (in milliseconds)
        Returns:
        New location after moving along the path

      • step

        public java.awt.geom.Point2D.Float step(float q)
        Evaluates p(q), the path as a mathematical function. This is the parameterized version that will likely be used often with paths representative of mathematical functions.
        Parameters:
        q - Parameter that determines p
        Returns:
        New location after moving along the path
